## Bio

My name is Habib Goloba, a driven student at Dublin City University specialising in Business Analytics. I am working towards a Bachelor of Business Studies, with a deep focus on utilising a variety of analytical platforms, tools, and methodologies.

#### [Overbooking Strategy Analysis for Green Airways](project2.qmd)

Green Airways operates three daily flights from Dublin to London. Each flight has a capacity of 100 passengers. To increase profitability, the airline wishes to explore overbooking strategies to compensate for no-show passengers.

#### [Kaggle sql dataset](project3.qmd)

I downloaded sample Bike Store data in CSV format from Kaggle and used these individual files to build an interconnected SQL database which help to show my individual skills and knowledge
